title: Legend of Hua Buqi - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Historical   Martial Arts   Romance
tags: Abandoned Children   Ability Steal   Adapted to Drama   Ancient China   Female Protagonist   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Nobles   Reincarnated in Another World   Sharp-tongued Characters   Transmigration
author: 桩桩
description:
A couple trying to con their way through a wedding fall off a cliff while plotting their escape. Both of them transmigrated.

In this life, she turned into a little beggar, while he turned into a handsome, wealthy ruler from a well-known family.

Their fates cross thirteen years later, each side oblivious to the other’s true identity.

Though they meet, they don’t recognize one another. She tries to hide her secret as she goes along with him.

She seems familiar, and he struggles between regrets and falling in love.

What kind of storm will form once Hua Buqi’s identity is uncovered?

Her older foster brother of the past and present, the young master of Feiyun Castle, and the mysterious, masked hero Lian Yike…

Between this lifetime and the last, who is the person meant to stay by her side?>
